item.description:
This walk is organized by the Blue Hills Adult Walking Club. Meet at the Haughton's Pond main parking lot at 840 Hillside street in Milton, at 1:00.

The walk is described as a " moderate walk, hilly terrain, 3.5 miles. Walk the green dot loop in the Great Blue Hill section via Wolcott Path."

Afterwards we will return to Pho So 1 for lunch.

51 Memorial Pkwy (Cross Street: Route 139)
Randolph, MA 02368
(781) 961-6500
item.name: another Blue Hills walk
